Frank Chance, graded PSA 1 MK.  This card has three pinholes in the front border, and the word "manager" written on the back.  Nice eye appeal for the grade.  $275 delivered.



Red Kleinow, graded PSA 2.  Again, good eye appeal for the grade.  $220 delivered.  



Scans available.
